statements: SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT student_id, name FROM Students WHERE student_id > 100 AND course_enrollment_status <> 'Dropped';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE course_enrollment_status IN ('Enrolled', 'On Hold') ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM Students WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'ACTIVE';
SELECT student_id, name, course_enrollment_status FROM Students WHERE student_id > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE course_enrollment_status IN ('ACTIVE', 'PENDING') ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_enrollment_status FROM Students ORDER BY course_enrollment_status ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'enrolled';
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, email, course_enrollment_status FROM students WHERE student_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'Enrolled' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM students WHERE student_id > 100 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, email, course_enrollment_status FROM students WHERE course_enrollment_status IN ('Enrolled', 'Pending') ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT id, name, email, course_enrollment_status FROM students WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_courses ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE course_enrollment_status='enrolled' ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%' OR course_name LIKE 'Science%' ORDER BY course_id ASC

SELECT s.name, s.email, c.course_name FROM students s JOIN student_courses sc ON s.id = sc.student_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = sc.course_id WHERE sc.enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sc.enrollment_date < '2022-06-01'

SELECT s.name, COUNT(sc.course_id) AS enrolled_courses FROM students s LEFT JOIN student_courses sc ON s.id = sc.student_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING COUNT(sc.course_id) >= 3 ORDER BY enrolled_courses DESC
SELECT s.name, COUNT(sc.course_id) AS enrolled_courses FROM students s LEFT JOIN student_courses sc ON s.id = sc.student_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING COUNT(sc.course_id) < 2 ORDER BY s.name ASC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, count(course_id) as total_courses_enrolled FROM Enrollments GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B') AND student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, enrollment_status FROM students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT students.name, courses.course_name FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.id = student_courses.id JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE id = 101;
SELECT course_name, grade FROM courses c JOIN grades g ON c.course_id = g.course_id;
SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.course_name AS course_name FROM students s JOIN student_courses sc ON s.id = sc.id JOIN courses c ON sc.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT s.name AS student_name, a.address AS student_address FROM students s LEFT JOIN addresses a ON s.id = a.id WHERE a.address IS NOT NULL;
